content.text:
# Draft:Luke C Hayward

Luke Charles Hayward  (born January 4 2001) is an American singer-songwriter.
Early Life
Born January 4, 2001, in Fargo, North Dakota. Started singing as part of a youth ministry program.
Worked on sugar beet farms in ND, farming jobs in Austin, Minnesota and handyman jobs in Big Sky, Montana.
Carrer
2020-2024 local singing in small halls like the Lions Club and small-town bars.
Current: Working on his first album [https://open.spotify.com/album/6ghLImLZ3miza4atwm69MS Lucky Boots - Single by Luke Hayward | Spotify]
Personal Life
Currently single, never been married, no children.
Currently no permeant address, working on the road.
References
